#summary Programs that have been built with Substrate.

= Applications =

This is an incomplete, opt-in list of applications that have been built using Substrate to interface with Minecraft worlds.  If you have written an application using Substrate, you may add insert it into this list.

|| *Application* || *Description* ||
|| [http://www.minecraftforum.net/topic/181988-nbtoolkit-map-processing-tools-beta-13/ NBToolkit] || A collection of command-line map processing tools.  Part of the Substrate project. ||
